Large Egg> Tough Skin??
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Characteristics: Large Egg> Tough Skin??
By Steel Dragon on Thursday, October 11, 2001 - 03:46 pm:

When I was raising a Morx Raiden and gave it a large egg, a box with the words tough skin appeared on-screen. Does this mean that feeding more would get me the tough skin characteristic? Does it have anything to do with the Helmet and Breast Plate that my Raiden is wearing?

By John Hawley on Thursday, October 11, 2001 - 04:32 pm:

You can try taking the accessories off and feeding another Large egg to see if the behavior repeats. If it does, it's something inherent to the Raiden/Morx you are raising. If it doesn't, then it's inherent to one or the other or the combination of both accessories.

By Steel Dragon on Thursday, October 11, 2001 - 04:45 pm:

It has had many large eggs before. It only said tough skin when it had both accesories.

By John Hawley on Thursday, October 11, 2001 - 05:48 pm:

I'd say that is a pretty good indicator that it is the accessories. Why don't you post the game descriptions up so others can test those two in combo also.

By danz on Friday, October 12, 2001 - 12:43 pm:

i dunno about that, but i HAVE found that large eggs are usually REALLY liked by my monstes, DO give/make better good stats, DO get rid of bad ones! mebbe thats why they're so expensive. i NEVER sell em tho. and i have found a few on ran ran's!
